Steps.Name: Siemplify_Change Priority
Steps.Description: Lower priority

Steps.Name: Condition
Steps.Description: This condition determines the progress of the playbook. Conditions are built based on cases data (cases, alerts, events, entities and environment properties) as-well as data that comes back from previous playbook steps.

Steps.Name: Siemplify_Instruction
Steps.Description: Integrate with security tools to block the indicator

Parameters.Name: ScriptParametersEntityFields
Parameters.Value: {"Instruction":"Integrate with security tools to block the indicator"}

Steps.InstanceName: Assess where the indicator was found
Steps.Name: Siemplify_Instruction
Steps.Description: Assess where the indicator took place, and whether the communication

Parameters.Name: ScriptParametersEntityFields
Parameters.Value: {"Instruction":"Assess where the indicator took place, and whether the communication "}

Steps.Name: Siemplify_Add General Insight
Steps.Description: Add a general insight configurable message to the case

Parameters.Name: ScriptParametersEntityFields
Parameters.Value: {"Title":"URL Execution","Message":"Current Screenshot:  [Check URL on URLscan.JsonResult| EntityResult.task.screenshotURL] ","Triggered By":"UrlScanIo"}

Steps.Name: VirusTotal_Get Domain Report
Steps.Description: Scan Domain via VirusTotal. *Check online report for full details.

Steps.Name: Siemplify_Change Priority
Steps.Description: Make priority higher

Steps.Name: VirusTotal_Scan URL
Steps.Description: Scan URL via VirusTotal. *Mark entity as suspicious and show insights if risk score matches a given threshold.

Steps.InstanceName: Is the indicator a true positive?
Steps.Name: MultiChoiceQuestion
Steps.Description: Is the indicator a true positive?

Parameters.Name: Question
Parameters.Value: Is the indicator a true positive?

Steps.Name: Siemplify_Assign Case
Steps.Description: Escalate case to L2

Steps.Name: MultiChoiceQuestion
Steps.Description: Was the connection to the indiator succesfull or was it blocked by another security tool (proxy, firewall,...)

Parameters.Name: Question
Parameters.Value: Was the connection to the indiator succesfull or was it blocked by another security tool (proxy, firewall,...)

Steps.Name: Siemplify_Close Alert
Steps.Description: Closes the current alert

Parameters.Name: ScriptParametersEntityFields
Parameters.Value: {"Reason":"Malicious","Root Cause":"System blocked the attack","Comment":"IOC blocked by security tool","Assign To User":"","Tags":""}

Steps.Name: Siemplify_Add General Insight
Steps.Description: Add a general insight configurable message to the case

Steps.Name: PassiveTotal_WhoIs Scan Address
Steps.Description: RiskIQ address WHOIS query

Steps.InstanceName: Disable the indicator on the threat intel platform
Steps.Name: Siemplify_Instruction
Steps.Description:
Disable the indicator on the threat intel platform.

Here, an integration towards tools like MISP or Anomali should be added, to be able to disable the indicator over the API

Steps.Name: Condition
Steps.Description: This condition determines the progress of the playbook. Conditions are built based on cases data (cases, alerts, events, entities and environment properties) as-well as data that comes back from previous playbook steps.

Steps.Name: PassiveTotal_Whois Host Reputation
Steps.Description: Request host reputation from RiskIQ

Steps.Name: Siemplify_Instruction
Steps.Description: Use the enrichment which was performed in the previous phases to make sure the IOC is still valid and online

Parameters.Name: ScriptParametersEntityFields
Parameters.Value: {"Instruction":"Use the enrichment which was performed in the previous phases to make sure the IOC is still valid and online"}

Steps.Name: Siemplify_Instruction
Steps.Description:
Add sighting to MISP

This should be replaced with an automated action towards MISP to mark the indicator as sighted and share it back to the community.

Steps.Name: VirusTotal_Scan IP
Steps.Description: Scan IP via VirusTotal. Returns table of reverse domains and full Json result

Steps.Name: Siemplify_Instruction
Steps.Description: Start the containment playbook to assess the root cause and limit the impact of the incident

Parameters.Value: {"Instruction":"Start the containment playbook to assess the root cause and limit the impact of the incident"}
